seo.title: Industrial Cleanrooms - Design & Installation | StarFilters
seo.description: Design, manufacturing, and installation of industrial cleanrooms. Professional ISO-certified solutions for pharmaceutical, electronics, and food industries in Mexico.

hero.title: Certified cleanrooms for critical processes
hero.description: At Star Filters we design, build, and validate cleanrooms certified under ISO 14644 and GMP standards, ensuring safe, precise, and reproducible processes.

quality.title: Certified quality
quality.paragraph1: A cleanroom or white room is a specialized environment designed to control airborne particles, microorganisms, and contaminants, maintaining conditions up to 50,000 times cleaner than a standard environment.
quality.paragraph2: Star Filters offers comprehensive turnkey cleanroom solutions, with advanced HEPA filtration systems, high-efficiency airflows, and precise temperature, humidity, and differential pressure control.
quality.paragraph3: We serve sectors such as pharmaceutical, biotechnology, electronics, medical devices, and automotive industries, meeting the most demanding international standards. From engineering and architectural design to validation and environmental monitoring, we guarantee controlled and certified environments, where air quality defines product quality.
